title: Physical rehabilitation approaches for the recovery of function and mobility following stroke
cleaned_text: As treatments for stroke continue to improve, research to identify the most effective rehabilitation strategies becomes increasingly important. In an updated Cochrane Review in April 2014, Alex Pollock from the Scottish Government funded Nursing, Midwifery and Allied Health Professional Research Unit based at Glasgow Caledonian University in Scotland and others have brought this research together. Alex describes the findings. This podcast
